# Dependencies

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(PRISMAstatement)
library(janitor)
library(DiagrammeRsvg)
library(DiagrammeR)
library(xml2)
library(rsvg)

```

# Prisma statement flowchart

```{r}

p1 <- 
  prisma(found = 115+116+78+63,
         found_other = 3+2,
         no_dupes = 153+79, 
         extra_dupes_box = (115+116+78+63+3+2) - (153+79),
         screened = 153+79, 
         screen_exclusions = (153+79)-(106+54), 
         full_text = 106+49,
         full_text_exclusions = 2+6, 
         qualitative = 104+49, 
         #quantitative = 104+49,
         labels = list(quantitative = "Total items found\n(n = 153)"),
         width = 1000, 
         height = 1000)

p1

p1 %>%
  export_svg %>% 
  charToRaw %>% 
  rsvg_png("prisma_flow_chart.png") 

p1 %>%
  export_svg %>% 
  charToRaw %>% 
  rsvg_pdf("prisma_flow_chart.pdf")

```

# Check count of articles against data

N articles

```{r}

# get data
data_review <- read_csv("../data/combined results/combined results.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

data_review %>%
  distinct(author, title) %>%
  count() %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_classic(full_width = FALSE)

```
